item.title: My Projects
item.description: Here are some of my current projects below! Website using Hugo! Hugo website currently works with CF, but no direct link as I have this website. Files with CF implementation is on my GitHubhere. Website using Verse!

item.title: About Me
item.description: Hiyo! I am currently a 20 year old, who is attending school at University at Buffalo. On top of my academics, I’m currently an intern at the leading cloud foundry consultancy company - Stark & Wayne. I am expected to graduate in 2020 with a B.S in Computer Science. I am just enjoying the ride and am using Hugo to create my website! Some of my hobbies include: hiking, climbing, going to the gym and when I have spare time, I play League of Legends!

item.title: Personal Website
item.description: This is a personal project of mine as I think it is good for all potential Computer Science graduates to have a website. This allows recruiters to see what you are capable of, and it is good to keep track of all your things! Currently, I have it hosted on GCP (Google Cloud Platform) but I have also implemented Cloud Foundry using PWS into my website that can be seen on my GitHub.

item.title: Data Webscraper
item.description: While interning at Stark & Wayne, I’ve created a Python script that would scrape data during an event based off a website called “Sched”. After the data was scraped, the results were on a csv file. This was built using BeautifulSoup and Requests.
